backend/main.mo: Main backend canister defining books, carts, orders, KYC state, access control, storage mixins, and owner recovery utilities.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module defining legacy state types and a pass-through run function for state upgrades.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping recent KYC‑related frontend changes to affected files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summary list describing the purpose of all frontend files in the project.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme variables, dark mode tokens, and base styling.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file loading the React app entrypoint.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the app’s routing, theme provider, toaster notifications, and root layout.
frontend/src/components/admin/BookMediaM: Admin tool for uploading, previewing, and removing book media files with progress tracking and validation.
Protects admin-only routes by checking identity and admin status, showing loading or error states before rendering children.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Displays a login/logout button using Internet Identity, handling login flow, logout, and error recovery.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Shows a dialog prompting authenticated users without a profile to enter a name and saves it via backend hooks.
frontend/src/components/books/BookCard.t: Renders a book preview card with cover, metadata, pricing, availability badges, and link to details.
frontend/src/components/books/CoverImage: Displays a static book cover image with fallback handling for load errors.
frontend/src/components/checkout/KycVeri: Collects and validates user document info for KYC-restricted purchases, submitting verification and showing success or errors.
frontend/src/components/checkout/SelfieC: Placeholder file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/EmptyState.tsx: Reusable UI component for displaying empty-state messages with optional icon and actions.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Renders the site footer with contact links, chat dialog, and attribution.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Displays the site header with navigation, user balance, cart status, and login/logout controls.
frontend/src/components/layout/Layout.ts: Defines the overall page layout including header, footer, routed content, and profile setup dialog.
frontend/src/components/layout/PageLayou: Provides a container wrapper with configurable max-width for page sections.
frontend/src/components/library/BookCont: Dialog that displays purchased book content and media with loading, errors, previews, and download actions.
frontend/src/components/library/LibraryP: Button that fetches and downloads a purchased book's PDF, handling auth, errors, and loading state.
frontend/src/components/support/Customer: Customer support chat dialog allowing users to send messages and view threaded responses.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React-query hook that creates and manages the authenticated or anonymous backend actor instance and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminRecovery.ts: Mutation hook to trigger admin access recovery with detailed error mapping and cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthz.ts: Hooks for fetching and saving the caller's user profile and checking admin status via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useBalance.ts: Hooks to fetch the user's token balance and mint new tokens, updating cache on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useBooks.ts: Collection of hooks for fetching, creating, updating, and uploading content for books via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useCart.ts: Hooks for managing the shopping cart, including fetching, adding, removing items, checkout, and computing totals.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, including login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useKyc.ts: Defines a mutation hook to submit document-based KYC proofs and handles backend validation responses.
frontend/src/hooks/useLibrary.ts: Fetches a user's purchased books and provides hooks for retrieving book content and media.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrders.ts: Provides hooks to fetch a single order, user-specific orders, or all orders using the actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty file serving as a placeholder for organizing query hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/useResetStore.ts: Defines a mutation hook to reset the backend store and invalidate related query caches, with permission-aware error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useSupportChat.ts: Implements hooks for sending support messages, fetching user/admin messages, and replying to messages with polling support.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a utility function for merging Tailwind class names cleanly.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminCatalogPag: Provides an admin interface to view, add, edit, and manage books, including dialogs for content and media management.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Renders the admin dashboard with tabbed navigation for catalog, orders, minting, support, and settings pages.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminMintPage.t: Allows admins to mint GLDT tokens by entering a principal and amount, with form validation and mutation handling.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrdersPage: Displays all customer orders in a table with order details, totals, and item lookup.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminRecoveryPa: Handles admin recovery flow using Internet Identity, showing login prompts, recovery actions, and success/error states.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminSettingsPa: Provides store reset functionality with warnings, confirmation dialog, and status alerts for reset operations.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminSupportInb: Admin page that lists customer support message threads and lets admins view and reply to messages.
frontend/src/pages/BookDetailsPage.tsx: Renders book detail UI with add-to-cart logic, loading skeletons, and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Handles viewing and managing the shopping cart, including quantity validation, item removal, and navigating to checkout.
frontend/src/pages/CatalogPage.tsx: Displays available books with search filtering and loading states using a grid of BookCard components.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Manages the checkout flow with balance checks, KYC validation, order submission, and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage with a hero section and a featured books grid sourced from available books.
frontend/src/pages/MyLibraryPage.tsx: Shows the user's purchased books with media indicators and supports reading or downloading book content.
frontend/src/pages/OrderConfirmationPage: Displays order confirmation details, purchased items, and navigation options after a successful checkout.
frontend/src/pages/PurchaseConfirmationP: Displays a purchase confirmation message with navigation buttons to library, order details, and catalog.
frontend/src/utils/download.ts: Provides helpers to download binary data or direct URLs as files via browser anchors.
frontend/src/utils/format.ts: Utility functions for formatting token amounts, principals, and timestamps into readable strings.
frontend/src/utils/kyc.ts: Generates stable KYC identifiers and validates document numbers for minimum formatting rules.
Detects backend KYC restriction errors and maps them to a user-friendly message.
frontend/src/utils/orderId.ts: Creates a simple order ID using timestamp and a random number.
frontend/src/utils/principal.ts: Parses and validates principal strings using the ICP SDK.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters, with support for hash routing and session storage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme colors, fonts, animations, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Captures project metadata, feature statuses, and requirements for updating KYC purchase restriction rules.
